name: Apple Clicker (OCMan101)
description: A simple arcade game about acquiring as many points as you can in 60 seconds, by clicking on fruit and avoiding bombs. Clicking on an apple awards one point, clicking on a pear awards 2 points, and clicking on a cherry earns 4. Audio may be muted in the settings menu, and you may also disable uploading scores to Scirra Arcade there as well. Have fun!
